function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access to fresh produce may lead to a higher consumption of processed, high-sodium, and less-nutritious foods with negative health impacts.","Impact":"Increased risk of diet-related diseases and poor nutrition.","Mitigation":"Improve access to fresh produce through local food markets and small businesses, and promote education on healthy eating choices.","Technologies":"Food delivery apps, online grocery services, and education platforms for nutritional guidance.","People":"Children and families with limited access to fresh produce.","Owner":"Local food markets, small businesses, educational institutions."},{"Description":"Reduced income and limited financial resources due to COVID-19 impact.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to food shortages and price spikes, pushing households into economic despair.","Mitigation":"Implement financial support programs, job creation initiatives, and economic recovery plans.","Technologies":"Digital banking, mobile payment systems, and online job platforms.","People":"Vulnerable families and households with reduced income.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and financial institutions."},{"Description":"Interruption of social safety nets, especially for women, in low- and middle-income countries (LMICs) due to COVID-19.","Impact":"Limited access to essential services and increased vulnerability for women.","Mitigation":"Strengthen social safety net programs, prioritize funding for women's services, and improve mobility and access to essential services.","Technologies":"Mobile health clinics, digital service delivery platforms, and telemedicine for remote consultations.","People":"Women in LMICs affected by interrupted social safety nets.","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and healthcare providers."}]}
